title: Two Volumes of solids of revolution part - b

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the hyperbola x2 − y2 = 9 , the x-axis, and the line x = 5 .
content.question: Set up, but do not integrate, an integral expression in terms of a single variable for the volume of solid generated when R is revolved about the line x = −1 .

frqParts.text: Set up, but do not integrate, an integral expression in terms of a single variable for the volume of solid generated when R is revolved about the line x = −1 .

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test to apply.
